description.narrative: By the end of 2019, female and male adolescents participate in their communities to develop life skills related to respectful coexistence, no discrimination, self protection and resilience in the face of adverse circumstances., which contributes to Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2019 positive opportunities for adolescent development and participation are expanded in more inclusive school and community environments, increasing educational access, inclusion and achievement, and adolescentsÂ´ resilience and capacity to protect themselves from violence, exploitation and crime, and to prevent early pregnancy.
